Server-Side API

All changes described in the ComboBox are applicable to the AutoComplete. AutoComplete can be bound to any collection, just define the DataTextField.

Other Options

Separator

Old

Html.Telerik().AutoComplete().Name(“AutoComplete”).Multiple(m => m.Separator(“, “))

New

Html.Kendo ().AutoComplete().Name(“AutoComplete”).Separator(“, “)
